attributes.action: A law that allows civil cases to be undertaken without an expiry date. I have a lowr bundl branch blok of my Heart and the time limit has gone!
attributes.additional_details: A pallet truck snapped and I received a swollen heart that never went back to normal, it now costs me monetarily but for the first few years i was very distressed- to the point of anguish and was manipulated- solicitors proved their lack in ethics and DBC proved they aren't worth any more pity- I need to sue them and I want no time limits on civil cases because this could make people consider breaking the law- there is more than 1 way to skin a cat springs to mind- lets keep things legal and have no expiry dates.
